entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who is feeling guilty and trying to justify himself. He is described as having a need to explain himself and is shown to be seeking answers about Sirius's disappearance.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who has been advising Harry to do something, but the exact nature of her advice is not specified. She is mentioned as someone who 'kept telling' Harry to do it.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who has gone missing, and Harry is trying to understand what happened to him. He is mentioned as someone who 'wouldn't' have been able to show Harry where to go.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A person who works in the Ministry of Magic, and Harry has gone to her office to ask about Sirius. She is not present in the scene, but Kreacher speaks to Harry through the fire.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who works at Grimmauld Place and has been serving more than one master. He is shown to be able to lie to Harry without punishment, and intended for Harry to go to the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who calmly tells Harry that Kreacher lied and was trying to send him on a mission. He is shown to be wise and understanding, and explains the situation to Harry.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: A government-like organization that deals with magical matters. It is mentioned as a place where Harry was intended to go by Kreacher.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Sirius's disappearance and is trying to understand what happened to him. This relationship is described as Harry having a need to justify himself and explain the situation.
Hermione has been advising Harry to do something, but the exact nature of her advice is not specified. This relationship is mentioned as Hermione 'kept telling' Harry to do it.
Kreacher intended for Harry to go to the Ministry of Magic, and sent him on a mission. This relationship is described as Kreacher lying to Harry and trying to send him on purpose.
Kreacher has been serving more than one master, including Dumbledore. This relationship is described as Kreacher being able to lie to Harry without punishment.
